snippet: When it came to the major challenges facing the Roman Catholic Church in the real world, Pope Benedict XVI often appeared to carom from one crisis to the next.
abstract: News analysis; if Pope Benedict XVI is judged by written words alone his tenure has been a solid success, but he often appeared to carom from one crisis to the next when it came to the major challenges facing the Roman Catholic Church; to many traditionalists, he is a hero who has reeled in the excesses of Vatican II, but liberal Catholics from the church’s social justice wing feel that he was intolerant of the church’s left and overly solicitous of the right.
lead_paragraph: When it came to the major challenges facing the Roman Catholic Church in the real world, Pope Benedict XVI often appeared to carom from one crisis to the next.

headline.seo: A Turbulent Tenure for a Quiet Scholar
headline.main: A Turbulent Tenure for a Quiet Scholar
headline.print_headline: A Turbulent Tenure for a Quiet Scholar
